titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 175th anniversary of the United States National Library of Medicine.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 5/4/2011--Introduced. Commemorates the 175th anniversary of the United States National Library of Medicine. Salutes the National Library of Medicine for a long and distinguished record of service to U.S. citizens and people around the world and for its many contributions in the area of information innovation.
